Use cases.description: Templates in 'Use cases' category should start with 'template-'

Utility.description: Templates in 'Utility' category should start with 'utility-'

Getting Started.description: Templates in 'Getting Started' category should start with 'gs-'

notes.general: Template names should be lowercase with hyphens separating words (kebab-case). Avoid using spaces, underscores, or special characters.
bestPractices: Keep names descriptive but concise (under 50 characters)
Use hyphens (-) underscores (_) instead of spaces
Include the main feature or purpose in the name
Avoid version numbers in the template name (use metadata instead)
